item.description:
Join P-Collective Member Mike at Scürvey Dög!

A repeat of the highly attended gathering last month, and becoming a regular monthly event, Mike has decided to do it again! Look for the non-descript black box at 1718 Westminster, next to Route 10 to find it. The last Wednesday of every month features the New Vintage Alternative 80's & Classic Punk Party. So whether you want to dress in black, go vintage punk or just check it out, here's your chance! It was a lot of fun last time!

Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: "Mike U (Astronomer Mike) is hosting this one - please look at his picture!!!!"
item.name: Special Wednesday Night Meetup - The Scürvey Dög!
